column1: The Pit Room////Got the 3 meat dinner with brisket
column3: pulled pork. The brisket was definitely my favorite of the 3 meats. So juicy
column4: tender and literally falling apart. The pork ribs were a tad dry
column5: but had good flavor. The pulled pork was also tender and went really well with the pickles and pickled onions. Definitely want to return to try their sausage and chicken!
